SEARCH
Package org.dmsextension.paperless.client

Klasse PaperlessInterceptor

java.lang.Object
org.dmsextension.paperless.client.PaperlessInterceptor
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
okhttp3.Interceptor
public class PaperlessInterceptor extends Object implements okhttp3.Interceptor
Default Paperless-ngx authentication interceptor. Gets the token for given user and password from the paperless api and adds the Authorization header to all calls.

  • Verschachtelte Klassen - Übersicht

  • Konstruktordetails

    • PaperlessInterceptor

      public PaperlessInterceptor(String user, String pw, String baseUrl)
      Default constructor
      Parameter:
      user - User to authenticate at the paperless api
      pw - Password to authenticate at the paperless api
      baseUrl - Base url of the paperless api

  • Methodendetails

    • intercept

      @NotNull public okhttp3.Response intercept(@NotNull okhttp3.Interceptor.Chain chain) throws IOException
      Method to intercept the api calls and add Authorization token
      Angegeben von:
      intercept in Schnittstelle okhttp3.Interceptor
      Parameter:
      chain - Chain of api call
      Gibt zurück:
      Modified chain with Authorization header
      Löst aus:
      IOException - Thrown, if no api token could be fetched
